verses.name: Hosea 13:4
verses.text: Yet I am the Lord thy God from the land of Egypt, and thou shalt know no god but me: for there is no saviour beside me.

verses.name: Hosea 13:5
verses.text: I did know thee in the wilderness, in the land of great drought.

verses.name: Hosea 13:6
verses.text: According to their pasture, so were they filled; they were filled, and their heart was exalted; therefore have they forgotten me.

verses.name: Hosea 13:7
verses.text: Therefore I will be unto them as a lion: as a leopard by the way will I observe them:
